name: Death Pong
description:
A simple multiplayer game, which is basically pong, but with the added abillity to leave your paddle, and fire your gun at the other player.

Leaving your paddle does not stop the game of pong, so watch out for the ball. It's big and will fuck you up.

Killing earns you 3 points and ends the round. It is the only way to end the round.
